item.description:
Come to relax at the end of the workweek and start the weekend. Watch City has a varied pub menu and several craft-brewed beers on tap. Join us for a couple of drinks followed by dinner. The pub has a casual atmosphere with great food, reasonably priced. If you don't see us at the bar, check with the hostess to see if we've gotten a table already. Come early if you want the half priced appetizers. Marie and/or Gordon are usually there by 5:30 PM.

Directions:

Driving on Interstate 95/128, take Exit 26 and follow Route 20 eastward for approx. 1-1/2 miles (7 lights) to the intersection with Moody St. (Sovereign Bank on the right). Make a right turn onto Moody St. and go to the second set of lights. Watch City is on the left side of Moody St. at the intersection with Pine St. Park on the streets or go to the municipal lot behind the restaurant (free after 6:00 PM). Just take the left at Pine St. and turn into the second left driveway near the movie theater. To view a map, visit http://www.watchcitybrew.com/ .

By "T" - Watch City is just a couple of blocks from the Waltham commuter rail stop. Several buses also stop at Moody and Pine, they are as follows: 170, 505, 553, 554, 556, & 558. See www.mbta.com for details.
item.name: Meet and Greet One More Time at Watch City Brewery
